extracted_information: Houston Development Intelligence (operated by Houston Land Guy) focuses on empowering small-to-medium builders with data-driven insights and market intelligence for Houston's real estate development. Their mission is to democratize access to sophisticated real estate development tools and market insights, believing every builder should have access to data-driven decision-making capabilities. They combine cutting-edge technology with deep local market expertise to help builders identify opportunities, analyze returns, and make confident investment decisions.

transactions.description: in Transactions (Proven track record in Houston real estate development)

projects_analyzed.description: Projects Analyzed (Comprehensive market intelligence and insights)
